Question: She agreed to allow the pregnancy to continue on condition that this person adopt the role of househusband; this he agreed to do.
Hints: This person also contributed "I'm the Greatest", to Starr's album Ringo (1973), released the same month.
Depressed, this person got intoxicated and had sex with a female guest, leaving Ono embarrassed.
The band, known as Etc., wore masks behind their heads, a dig by this person who thought Grade was two-faced.
